715942f-a.title: Manhattan: Allen Street - Stanton Street
715942f-a.text:
Allen Street at the N.E. corner of Stanton Street.
June 21, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
715942f-a.folder: Allen Street & Stanton Street, Manhattan, NY

715943f-a.title: Manhattan: Allen Street - Stanton Street
715943f-a.text:
181-207 Allen Street, west side, from Stanton to Houston Streets.
These buildings have been shaved preparatory to widening the street.
February 17, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
715943f-a.folder: Allen Street & Stanton Street, Manhattan, NY

715941f-a.title: Manhattan: Allen Street - Stanton Street
715941f-a.text:
Allen Street, east side, north from Stanton St.,
showing the cleared area caused by widening f this thorough-
faro. To the left is the 2nd Ave. ''E1'' line and its 1st Street
Station.
View 1: February 17, 1928
View 2: April 1, 1934
P. L. Snerr
NO REPRODUCTIO S
